starter_egg.name: Starter Egg
starter_egg.description: Contained within this egg are all the essentials an adventurer requires to initiate their journey within the realm of Tokane. While it might not be the finest available, it undoubtedly promises to be of great assistance!

genesis_egg.name: Genesis Egg
genesis_egg.description: So much power in such a tiny egg. Should go well with some bacon.

everglade_egg.name: Everglade Egg
everglade_egg.description: Found deep in the murky swamps, the Everglade Eggs have mutated to camouflage themselves amongst the creeping moss and fungus.

prairie_egg.name: Prairie Egg
prairie_egg.description: Prairie Eggs thrive in dry heat and are often found in the tall grass - whatever's inside may share attributes with this unique environment...

quantum_egg.name: Quantum Egg
quantum_egg.description: The Quantum Egg stands as an enigmatic marvel, its shiny shell mirroring the colours of far-off and incredible places, teasing at the everchanging mysterious creature tucked inside...

beach_egg.name: Beach Egg
beach_egg.description: Stick your ear to its shell and you can hear the waves of the ocean, feel the hit of summer, and find yourself craving a sweet and refreshing snack.

companion_egg.name: Companion Egg
companion_egg.description: It's a good omen when building a new home to find a companion egg nearby, as the Neftie that comes out of it will protect the house and its habitants.

renegade_egg.name: Renegade Egg
renegade_egg.description: The inner red glow can be seen pulsating if you blast a heavy metal tune.

zen_egg.name: Zen Egg
zen_egg.description: If you calm your breathing and quiet your mind, you can hear the Neftie growing within.

cliff_egg.name: Cliff Egg
cliff_egg.description: These eggs are tough to crack, but from within, emerge only the strongest Nefties!
